articles.author: Caroline Valetkevitch
articles.title: S&P 500, Nasdaq close down, ending 5-session winning streaks; retailers, tech weak - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. stocks retreated on Tuesday, with the S&P 500 and Nasdaq snapping five-session winning streaks as retailers declined after some disappointing outlooks and as technology shares fell.
articles.content: NEW YORK, Nov 21 (Reuters) - U.S. stocks retreated on Tuesday, with the S&P 500 and Nasdaq snapping five-session winning streaks as retailers declined after some disappointing outlooks and as tec… [+2616 chars]
